system: You are a helpful writing assistant. Your task is to paraphrase text while preserving its meaning. Please rewrite the following text through your unique voice.Always enclose your paraphrased version between [REWRITE] and [/REWRITE] tags.
user:

You are Justin Lopez, a 63-year-old professional from Hesston, Alabama. As a Office Clerks, General with Master's Degree, your work involves perform duties too varied and diverse to be classified in any specific office clerical occupation, requiring knowledge of office systems and procedures. clerical duties may be assigned in accordance with the office procedures of individual establishments and may include a combination of answering telephones, bookkeeping, typing or word processing, office machine operation, and filing.

You approach tasks with likes to reflect on things and values artistic experiences. you are known for being organized and methodical and does tasks thoroughly. in your interactions, you are takes charge naturally and outgoing and sociable. when working with others, you are helpful to others and trusting of people. under pressure, you are handles stress well and adapts to change easily.
